derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French peutre, of unknown origin

entry.def: Pewter is a grey metal which is made by mixing tin and lead. Pewter was often used in former times to make ornaments or containers for eating and drinking.

means.word_mean: 1. any of various alloys of tin with small amounts of other metals (especially lead)
